DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess among others environmental and hygiene-related risk factors for microscopic colitis (MC), a common diarrheal disease.
DOC.brief_title: Case-Control Study to Identify Risk Factors for Microscopic Colitis
DOC.criteria: Confirmed Diagnosis of MC (CC or LC) between January 1, 2000 and December 31, 2012. Inhabitant of the province of Limburg or the Eindhoven region at the moment of diagnosis Below 18 years of age at the time of diagnosis Not capable of signing an informed consent Deceased at moment of approximation
